003.text: A cow and a buffalo lived by a pond. The were neightbors.

004.text: The buffalo worked very hard on this field every day.

005.text: The cow was very lazy. He always dipped himself into the pond all day long.

006.text: When the buffalo was cultivating on his land, the cow told him: 'Brother buffalo cultivation is such a tiring job! Why don't you sink yourself into the water like me?'

007.text: 'I have to prepare for winter. You should also start to prepare food!' Answered the buffalo
